function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proliferation of network-addressable devices embedded in everyday objects","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases spreading through objects","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of network-addressable devices and increased awareness of hygiene practices","Technologies":"Ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI) for disinfection, antimicrobial coatings for devices","People":"General public, building occupants, healthcare workers","Owner":"Building management, device manufacturers"},{"Description":"Number of connected devices to reach over 20 billion 'things' by 2020","Impact":"Increased data generation and potential challenges in data management, including health-related data","Mitigation":"Data encryption, secure data storage, and strict access control policies for health-related data","Technologies":"Encryption algorithms, secure data storage solutions, access control systems","People":"Data managers, IT professionals, healthcare organizations","Owner":"Data management teams, IT departments, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Placement of wireless sensing devices (nodes) in and around the phenomena of interest","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through contact with wireless sensing devices","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of wireless sensing devices, implementation of touchless technology for data collection","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings for devices, touchless data collection solutions","People":"General public, researchers, data collection personnel","Owner":"Research organizations, data collection teams"}]}
